meanings.definition: A request for information or action.
meanings.sent1: I sent a quist to the teacher asking for help with my homework.
meanings.sent2: The quist for more details about the project was submitted yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The quist for extra cookies at lunch made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her quist for adventure led her to explore the hidden cave.
meanings.sent5: The loud quist for silence in the library startled everyone.

meanings.definition: To seek or search for something.
meanings.sent1: She decided to quist for her missing keys in the living room.
meanings.sent2: The detective will quist for clues to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent3: He likes to quist for new restaurants to try every weekend.
meanings.sent4: The explorer will quist for the legendary treasure in the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The cat will quist for its favorite toy under the sofa.
